quotes.text: प्रज्ञानम् ब्रह्म
quotes.author: Aitareya Upanishad

quotes.text:
जातस्य हि ध्रुवो मृत्युर्ध्रुवं जन्म मृतस्य च।
तस्मादपरिहार्येऽर्थे न त्वं शोचितुमर्हसि॥ **२-२७**
quotes.author: Bhagwad Geeta

quotes.text:
कर्मण्येवाधिकारस्ते मा फलेषु कदाचन।
मा कर्मफलहेतुर्भूर्मा ते सङ्गोऽस्त्वकर्मणि॥ २-४७
quotes.author: Bhagwad Geeta

quotes.text: मुर्ख लोगो से वाद-विवाद नहीं करना चाहिए क्योंकि ऐसा करने से हम अपना ही समय नष्ट करते है.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: भाग्य उनका साथ देता है जो कठिन परिस्थितयो का सामना करके भी अपने लक्ष्य के प्रति ढृढ रहते है.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: कोई भी व्यक्ति ऊँचे स्थान पर बैठकर ऊँचा नहीं हो जाता बल्कि हमेशा अपने गुणों से ऊँचा होता है.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: बुद्धि से पैसा कमाया जा सकता है,पैसे से बुद्धि नहीं.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text:
नैनं छिन्दन्ति शस्त्राणि नैनं दहति पावकः।
न चैनं क्लेदयन्त्यापो न शोषयति मारुतः॥ २-२३
quotes.author: Bhagwad Geeta

quotes.text:
असतो मा सद्गमय ।
तमसो मा ज्योतिर्गमय ।
मृत्योर्माऽमृतं गमय ॥1.3.28
quotes.author: Brihadaranyaka Upanishad

quotes.text: It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: खुद का अपमान करा के जीने से तो अच्छा है मर जाना क्योकि प्राणों को त्यागने से एक ही बार कष्ट होता है पर अपमानित होकर जिंदा रहने से बार-बार कष्ट होता है.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Circumstances don't make the man, they only reveal him to himself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: सतुंलित दिमाग जैसी कोई सादगी नही,संतोष जैसा कोई सुख नही,लोभ जैसी कोई बीमारी नही और दया जैसा कोई पुण्य नही है.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.text: Your depression is connected to your insolence and refusal to praise.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text:
सत्यमेव जयते नानृतं सत्येन पन्था विततो देवयानः।
येनाक्रमन्त्यृषयो ह्याप्तकामा यत्र तत्‌ सत्यस्य परमं निधानम्‌ ॥3.1.6
quotes.author: Mandukya Upanishad

quotes.text:
मातृ देवो भव।
पितृ देवो भव।
आचार्य देवो भव।
अतिथि देवो भव॥1.11.2
quotes.author: Taittiriya Upanishad

quotes.text: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.text: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
quotes.author: Brihadaranyaka Upanishad

quotes.text: If you take on too much without a solid foundation, you will eventually ne drained, leaving you with embarrassment and bad luck.
quotes.author: I Ching

quotes.text: _Luck_ is what happens when **preparation** meets **opportunity**.
quotes.author: Four Leaf Clover

quotes.text:
You will naturally feel fear in the face of things you've never tried before.
As you carry that fear and advance, the world you live in will become more vast.
quotes.author: Blossoming Sword Saint

quotes.text: To know then thousand things, know one well.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Mushashi

quotes.text: We cannot choose our external circumstances, but we can always choose how we respond to them.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: You can see the outside, but you can't see what's going on inside?
quotes.author: Dam Ho

quotes.text: How can a man not stand by his **principles**? Give to his _hunger_ easily.
quotes.author: Scholar's Reincarnation

quotes.text: Even if the cost is a **gruesome death**, we must uphold **justice** on _Earth!_
quotes.author: Ye Qing

quotes.text:
I am not afraid of Muslims,
I'm not afraid of Britishers,
I'm afraid of Hindus against Hinduism.
quotes.author: Veer Savarkar

quotes.text: Joyful in difficulty, the people forget about their death.
quotes.author: I Ching

quotes.text:
There are two types of Pain,
Pain that _hurts_ you and Pain that _changes_ you.
quotes.author: Naruto

quotes.text: In a country well governed, poverty is something to be ashamed of. In a country badly governed, wealth is something to be ashamed of.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.text: When anger rises, think of consequences.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.text: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals; adjust the action steps.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.text: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: No man is free who is not master of himself
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.text: Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.text: Your thoughts are primary cause of everything.
quotes.author: The Secret Book

quotes.text: बहुत से गुणो के होने के बाद भी सिर्फ एक दोष सब कुछ नष्ट कर सकता है.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: जो व्यक्ति शक्ति न होने पर मन में हार नहीं मानता उसे संसार की कोई भी ताकत परास्त नहीं कर सकती.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: एक अनपढ़ व्यक्ति का जीवन उसी तरह होता है जैसे की किसी कुत्ते की पूछ जो न ही उसके पीछे का भाग ढकती है और न ही उसे कीड़ो से बचाती है.
quotes.author: Chanakya
